VISION

Aura is the first platform to unite the emerging real world crypto space. By connecting crypto talent, consultants and companies and even pay in crypto. Aura will expedite the hiring and communication, increasing overall market success.

Aura is the next generation of a workplace for innovators from over the globe. With the power of emotional recognition and machine learning we build unique profiles to match companies and employees. Transparent transactions on a blockchain and smart contracts are bringing trust in remote teams.
